# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty structure that represents a white point.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializers

- **init(white_x:white_y:)**: Creates a structure that represents a white point according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.description: Creates a structure that represents a white point according to the CIE 1931 color space.
items.name: init(white_x:white_y:)
